name: Christmas Alpaca Adventure
description:
'This is way better than Brothers' -Jeff Gerstmann

Chrome reccomended, audio issues will be present in other browsers

A short Christmas themed two button platform game

Santa has to eat gold once a year to give him his magic powers

Every Christmas, Alpaca helps Santa to gather Gold from the forest

Help Santa and Alpaca to get all the Golds to Save Christmas!!!

Merry Christmas!

Inspired by 'Hero Klungo sssavesss teh world'

Music by The 8bitpeoples - 8bitpeoples.com, from the album 'The 8bits of Christmas'
